Success is based on a percentage rather than a quota: in order to pass a round with a requirement of 60, the player has to correctly answer three out of every five questions (or better).

Yuuyu was a member of the idol group Onyanko (Kitten) Club, which were hugely popular in Japan during the late 80s. She emcees the in-game quiz show via digitized photos and voice samples, introducing the many rounds and frequently chanting "Go! Go!".

name: Yummy Cubes
summary: Enjoy addictive yummy puzzles for FREE! Challenge yourself and beat levels NOW!

name: Yume Nichiroku
summary: Yume Nichiroku is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, focusing on exploration and finding effects within the Hirosae's dreamworld, which is ultimately the main goal of the game. A minigame can be played by interacting with the handheld console.

name: Yuldigard's Fate
summary: The capital of his native Yuldigard Alzia is torn apart by a civil war, in order to avoid death, the prince has to flee the city, pretending to be a wanderer. He has to find refuge in the provincial town of Torchbergen, but this visit is destined to drag on for a long time ...

name: Yufo
summary: Yufo's planet got drunk, so now they're stuck in limbo-verse, waiting till things improve at home. Another creature lives in limbo-verse, with the ability to either ensure its safety, or its demise. Let's hope the creature is kind...

name: Yumori Forest
summary: Yumori Forest is a violently stylish action game focused on fast-paced combat, chaotic boss fights and unforgiving difficulty.

name: Yuoni
summary: Yuoni is a first-person narrative horror game that whisks you away to a sunset-stained world to play a deadly game of hide and seek. As grade-schooler Ai, navigate authentic Japanese environments and utilise every hiding space you can find to survive the horrors ahead. And if they find you… run.

name: Yuru-huwa Souls
summary: It is an authentic fantasy that provides a sense of accomplishment in conquering stages.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Terminal 6
summary: The Duel Terminal was designed by Konami to assist in introducing the then new Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's anime to new and existing players. The Duel Terminal itself looks like a traditional arcade machine and has a variety of game modes, using cards from the Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game. Players can either use a Deck chosen by the system, or the Duelist can use his/her own cards.

name: Yupi
summary: Run, jump and collect coins .. Yupi has come to save us!

name: Yummy Girl
summary: Yummy Girl is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swop bricks, in order to make the pictures restored.

name: Yume Nikki: Atari 2600
summary:
Yume Nikki Atari 2600, is an adaptation of Kikiyama's original Yume Nikki replicating style of the Atari console "Atari 2600" a popular console from the 70s - 80s.

The game is to get "Tojos" to get effects without being caught by the toriningens, in a variety of popular maps by original Yume Nikki.

name: Yuushun Rhapsody
summary: Yuushun Rhapsody is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Yurivania 0: Soul Night Prelude
summary:
Monstergirls work together to help out some lost ghosts~!

The Midnight Palace is hosting a major ritual to assist spirits navigating the realms beyond mortality. Tibby the skeleton is planning on attending and really wants her friend Stheno to come along. To get there on time, they will have to work together to overcome some unexpected obstacles, maybe making a new friend along the way!

Gather as much spirit energy as you can find, and maybe Stheno will build up the courage to as a very important question!

name: Yuko: tragic love story
summary: This is a tragic love story of the protagonist Yuko. The main events unfold in the city park, where Yuko finds her girlfriend.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Dawn of the Battle Royale
summary: In Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel, the tide can turn at any moment as you and your opponent summon powerful monsters left and right and fill up your hands with countless draws. One minute you might be in total control, the next your opponent gains the momentum! Explore the world of the animated series Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens and take on characters from the show in swift and intense Duels. Win Duels, collect new cards and build up your Deck. Challenge your friends locally or go online and take on Duelists across the globe.

name: Yuri Lowell Prints a Gun
summary:
A short reflection on luigi mangione through the lens of media specifically Tales of Vesperia

Made for boshi's place Year of Luigi show

name: Yumm Monsters
summary: Flick candy and feed the hungry monsters! Yumm Monsters is an all new addicting arcade game that will have you swiping for hours.

name: Yukkuri no Meikyuu
summary: Yukkuri no Meikyuu is a Japanese, first-person dungeon crawler.

name: YuckFu!
summary:
In Yuckfu! you control a little spacecraft and your task is to collect as many "fuckits" as possible, while avoiding to crash into the walls/floor/ceiling.
Fuckits become solid if you do not collect them within a certain amount of time - decreasing your remaining space to move on the screen.

name: Yume Dreamer
summary: Yume Dreamer is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. Play as a shy girl called HER who's in a strange world when she enters her dreams. Explore her dreams and experience them for yourself!

name: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs: Steam Dungeon - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs: Steam Dungeon
Three Special-Illustrated Double-Sided Pillow Covers
Mini Visual Guidebook
Special-Illustrated Exclusive Packaging
Original costume DLC

name: Yurivania: Uhaul of the Night
summary:
Stheno the gorgon wants her girlfriend Alraune to move in, but to accommodate a plantgirl Stheno's room needs an overhaul!

Hopefully their castle community can provide everything they need to make the space comfy for both of them!

Explore the Midnight Palace, ask your girlfriends and other monstergirls for help, and make the perfect two-lady lovenest!

You might have to avoid some nasty traps or trounce a creepy human along the way, but in the end love always wins!

name: Yume Cyber
summary: YUME CYBER is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you play as a robot named Ingo-A and explore surreal worlds via the TV in your room. The goal is to collect the thirteen MODES and unlock one of two possible endings.

name: Yuna and other troubles
summary: When an exemplary student Hasegawa Yuna was transferred to the prestigious Sakura no Hanabira Academy, she planned to continue to study hard. But it turned out that the life at the academy is very different from her expectation.

name: Yume no Kirby
summary: Yume no Kirby is an English Kirby/Yume Nikki fangame created by Ondaja in RPG Maker 2003. It was developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Yu Hayami no American Kids: Eigo de Bikkuri
YuMe
summary: Solve puzzles and guide Yume on an interplanetary journey home!

name: Yuha's Nightmares
summary: This is a simulation game about the nightmares that our main character Yuha suffers from. You will explore the surrealistic world that is full of unexpected events. The deeper part of Yuha's consciousness is depicted through the flip side of the 3D world.

name: Yu'N'Mi
summary:
YU'N'MI uses the device's TrueDepth camera system to track the state of your eyes and mouth. This allows for a unique user experience - a game you can play with your face. In order for this functionality to be possible, the app requires access to your device's camera. This access can be toggled on or off at any time in your device's settings.
The camera images and resulting depth data are only used for gameplay purposes. The live video feed is never used, and its data is never stored locally or remotely. Camera access is required to get depth data from Apple's API's.
Face data is never stored on the device or remotely, given to third parties, or used for any non-gameplay purposes. The face data only remains on your device during your current game session and never leaves your device at any time.
No ads, no in-app purchases, just Rock'n'Roll.

name: Yuugao
summary: Infamous doujin game also known as Cruel Kanon.

name: Yukyo Station
summary: A story-driven, 2D, action packed, rogue-like platformer set in a fictional nation's metro system infested with the supernatural.

name: Yume Gufi
summary: Explore dream worlds, collecting effects with unique interactions. No goals, just wander.

name: Yumper
summary:
This is a single player, fast paced platformer with projectiles.

Jump with A, and talk / shoot with B.

name: Yume 4
summary: Yume 4 is a maze-breaking game, in which Chen Xi moves in the opposite direction to her previous life. Players need to use keyboard control to reach the designated position to enter the next level!

name: Yumiko in the Haunted Mansion
summary: A maze-style ZX Spectrum title. Help Yumiko avoid ghosts, light the haunted mansion's candles, and rescue your parents across 32 stages before time runs out!

name: Yugekitai Kakuto-hen: Saikyoushin Fukkatsu no Maki
summary: This is a fighting game from a doujin developer that did a number of games involving the comically-deformed gang that stars in this one. Lots of humor value.

name: Yume
summary: Yume on PC is a side-scrolling action/platformer where you play as young Yin, trapped in the world of dreams. Armed with a sword and a mysterious stone, he will have to face hordes of enemies to find the key to the mystery of this decidedly unwelcoming world.

name: Yuuwaku Office Ren'ai-ka
summary: In the vein of Tokimeki Memorial, the game follows the protagonist's love affairs inside an average Japanese company.

name: Yume Nisshi
summary: Yume Nisshi is a Yume Nikki fangame made by Zenmaigahara. The game stars Usotsuki, whose name literally means "liar"; not to be confused with Urotsuki, Yume 2kki's protagonist.

name: Yuckfu
summary: Help a cute robot collect crates and avoid crashing into walls. Frantic arcade action with 3D graphics.

name: Yumemori
summary: A short, sweet and charming puzzle game about a girl named Aurora, who is trapped in a dreamy room filled with everything she could possibly desire. Explore her wonderland to find a way out and discover the true nature of this fantastical room. All dreams, good or bad, must come to an end... right?

name: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 2 - Inshou-ha, Kouki Inshou-ha no Kyoshou
Yume Nikki Rythm
summary: A Yume Nikki themed rhythm game.

name: Yume Nikki Jam 2018 Submission
summary: Yume Nikki Jam 2018 Submission, also shortened to YNJ-2018, is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. You explore the dreams of a certain rabbit.

name: Yukkuri Tanoshimi Taijin no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Watase Seizou - Love Umi to Blue
Yuri Dating Agency
summary: This is a speed dating sim.

name: Yuppy's Adventure
summary: A Jump and Run Adventure like many before it, but with a twist. There are/are going to be many new mechanics not present in the classics. Also a Combination with other Genres is in Progress, for example Space Shooter. Stay curious!

name: Yuma Will Burn
summary: Yuma Will Burn is a narrative indie game where you play as a doctor in desperate circumstances. Left to die in a cave, you must find ways to survive in an uncaring world. Harsh survival mechanics will lead you to earnestly experience triage, poverty, and fear.

name: Yury
summary: Yury is a deliberately retro platform/arcade action game that combines old-school graphics, classic mechanics and challenging gameplay with a sense of sci-fi survival horror atmosphere.

name: Yuying Mansion
summary: A casual simulation game that allows players to live with beautiful women and play Tetris together, achieving points and receiving praise from the other party. Players can move to the character's area to chat or play a Tetris game. You can make a beautiful woman undress and reveal her body.

name: Yurei Ninja
summary:
You: A ninja, back from the dead, seeking revenge against…
The Enemy: A samurai warlord with the blackest of hearts who turned against you!
Trained in the art of hiding and surprise attacks, avoid traps, strike down enemies and destroy deadly bosses, all trying to stop your quest.

name: Yuuto Ichika's One Time Wonder
summary: Yuuto Ichika's One Time Wonder is a game jam project featuring a novice magician named Yuuto, who must use objects such as rocks to properly cast spells.

name: Yukigatari Renewal
summary:
The protagonist's little sister appears as a new character.
Scenarios have been remade since the Dreamcast release, and new event CGs and endings added.
This version also adds voices for the male characters which original only female characters were.

name: Yule Sock
summary: Christmas-themed retro, 8-bit, arcade game for casual singleplayer fun

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Waking the Dragons - Joey’s Journey
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Red-Eyes Deck and PSY-Frame Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yume-Iroiro
summary: Yume-Iroiro is a dating simulation game in the style of Tokimeki Memorial and other games, but in this game at the beginning the player can choose to be a male or a female character.

name: Yumpr
summary: Yumpr has crashed in hostile enviroment! Filled up with dangerous creatures and obstacles. Help him survive this crazy world!

name: Yummy Mahjong
summary: Yummy mahjong is a game for fans of the mahjong connect genre. Collect identical pairs of goodies to clear the playing field and go to the next level.

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 6
Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 5
Yurivania 1: Uhaul of the Night
summary: What does a gorgon bring on her second date?

name: Yuukyuu no Eden: The Eternal Eden
Yume Inu
summary:
A Yume Nikki fangame. Traverse the strange dreams of Hamigaki.

Unlike most fangames, there are two types of dreams the player can have: Lucid and Normal. The Normal dream option takes the player to a random world, while the Lucid dream takes the player to a Nexus-like area. This area starts out empty, with access to other worlds unlocked through having Normal dreams.

The goal of the game is to find all of the effects hidden inside the dream world.

name: Yuuwaku no Toiki
summary: Tetsuya is a 4th grade college student who takes up a part-time job to tutor one of the daughters of a famous novelist in his mansion. But for a salary of 1 million yen per month he also agrees to serve as bodyguard to novelist's wife Ayako whose life is endangered by an unknown person.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Gong v. Kit
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Superheavy Samurai Deck and X-Saber Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny is a strategy video game with over 1,000 Yu-Gi-Oh! cards that integrates the trading card gameplay and rules with 3D monster battles. Players engage in strategic duels against AI opponents, exploring various game modes including Link Duel and Triple Duel modes, which offer fresh challenges and test players' skills against multiple opponents simultaneously.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 6
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 6 is a card video game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment and Tenky and published by Konami Digital Entertainment in 2011.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Millennium Duels
summary: In Yu-Gi-Oh! Millennium Duels, players enter a Virtual Dueling System, an advanced program wherein they battle against simulated Duelists from the animated TV show, characters from past, classic Yu-Gi-Oh! storylines, through to those from the current Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL adventures. Players can also unlock avatars from the animated series and take them online to battle other players in versus matches.

name: Yuushi no Monshou: Deep Dungeon
summary: Hundreds of years have passed, the spirit of the long forgotten evil Emperor Ruu has returned. A hero claiming to be the descendant of the previous hero Raru appears in the town of Dorl, and sets on exploring a tower in order to defeat Ruu.

name: Yua's Yuri Office
summary: Yua's Yuri Office is a Visual Novel in which you play as Yua, just returning to the office after things have been shut down for an extended period. Yua is determined to take full advantage of this fresh start to improve her life. Will she pursue friendship, romance, or just focus on her work?

name: Yurivania 2: Josette's Quest
summary:
Vampire girlfriend houses her community~!

The Midnight Palace's vampire quarter has become overcrowded.

Josette, vampire facilitator, planed a date with her girlfriend, Tibby, tonight.

But the expansion deadline has come and Josette needs to put her community ahead of romance.

Explore the Palace, interact with the monstergirls, gathering building materials, and decide how the new wing looks.

Along the way, maybe find a way to make up to Tibby for the missed date...!

name: Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku 2nd Album
summary: Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku 2nd Album (悠久幻想曲 2nd Album) is a romance simulation the Sega Saturn released in 1998 by MediaWorks.

name: Yui Tui
summary: Yui Tui is a 2D Platform Action game where Yako, the protector of the island, has been assigned to eliminate the enemies who infiltrated the island with an intention of ruling over it.

name: Yuugen Gaisha London Star: Koi no Double Click
summary: A visual novel from Ivory.

name: Yukigatari
summary: A adult visual novel released in 2001.

name: Yume Petto
summary:
Yume Petto is a Petscop fangame in the style of Yume Nikki. Explore familiar places as well as new worlds of all kinds, and collect all of the effects.
Every world, characters etc must be at least a bit related to the Petscop universe.

name: YuYu Hakusho Forever
summary: A PlayStation 2 game based on the manga and anime YuYu Hakusho.

name: Yu Shen Qian Kun
summary: "Yu Shen Qian Kun" is a blueprint based on Xiu Xian's novels. Combining the various elements of the novel, it outlines the world of aesthetics. The protagonist pedals the best flying swords, the gods are in the hands of the fairy, and carry the supreme magic weapon, the spirit pet fairy follow, proud of the tourists, spirits,...

name: Yumsters!
summary: These adorable hole-dwelling creatures will please everyone. They are mad about fruit and even participate in a world fruit-eating cup. You'll need to gather a team of super-yumsters from different countries to win this competition.

name: Yuki and Rina Football
summary: Yuki & Rina are 2 young talented football players. They showed incredible football skills and their coach and manager decided it was time to train them to become Pro Players in the famous “Soccer stars Major Football League”. Before becoming Pro Players, Yûki & Rina must pass the ultimate test, which is a combination of agility, skills and reflex.

name: Yuri Paddle: An Anime Convention Murder Mystery
summary: Onkai Expo is on fire. As the guest coordinator of a smalltime anime convention with big problems, it's up to the underpaid and overburdened Stella to solve the murder of a famous cosplayer.

name: Yummy Yummy Cooking Jam
summary: A downloadable cooking game.

name: Yumeutsutsu Re:Idol
summary: Short story spin-off to Yumeutsutsu Re:Master, and introduction to the world of Yumeutsutsu. The members of Eureka Soft come together to solve a problem that could endanger the whole world: Ai Ohtori's personality is too weak. To fix that, she will need to... become an idol?!?

name: Yuko and the Akuma Menace
summary: Yuko and the Akuma Menace is a top-down, grid based movement, adventure maze game set in a ninja world of fantastic creatures and magic. Fight monsters with your kunai, shurikens and smoke bombs. Cross dangers using the magical orbs, and save the world from the greatest threat ever.

name: Yume Nikki 3D
summary: Yume Nikki 3d is a fan game based on Yume Nikki universe with surreal exploration.

name: Yut Yut
summary: Yut Yut is a game about tanks containing tanks in which many tanks die. Fight through this tanky tank game to face your mortal tank enemy and reclaim your tank village's lost cabbage god.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Tag Force Special
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Tag Force Special is the seventh installment of the Tag Force video game series.

name: Yumsters 2: Around the World
summary: Not only are these Yumsters crazy for strawberries, they can rock the bongos. For the love of fruity music, help them earn money by cleaning gardens to promote their band. To really skyrocket, Yumsters need the best equipment to win the ultimate grand prize at the fairy town music showdown. Get fruitilicious in five vibrant locations of Yumsters 2, a sweet Match 3 puzzler.

name: Yumeria
summary: A visual novel for the PlayStation 2. It went on to spawn an anime series.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Jack Atlas vs Yuya
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Red Dragon Archfiend Deck and Dinomist Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2, known as Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX TAG FORCE 2 in Japan, is the second installment in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Tag Force series.

name: Yume Nikki GB
summary: Yume Nikki GB is a Yume Nikki fangame. It is a demake of the original game for the Game Boy. This is a game in which you traverse the extremely dark world inside a dream.

name: Yuuki
summary: Yuuki is a heartfelt raising simulation game. Look after a cute and fluffy foxgirl for a few months. Raise her well and help turn her life around.

name: Yuuki Yuna wa Yuusha de Aru S
summary: Yuuki Yuna wa Yuusha de Aru S is a Japanese visual novel based on the Yuuki Yuna wa Yuusha de Aru franchise. The story follows the five female club members of the Sanshu Middle School Hero Club, who are tasked of protecting the world from mysterious monsters known as Vertex. The visual novel features ten different scenarios original to the game and is fully voiced by the original cast. It was released as an extra with the sixth DVD and Blu-ray volumes for the TV anime.

name: Yupi Road 2 World
summary: Yupi, the alien, embarks on the mission to save the Earth, helping humans and armed with his power boots, he must overcome the levels avoiding or using enemies to make his way.

name: Yuugen Gaisha Chikyuu Boueitai
summary: Yuugen Gaisha Chikyuu Boueitai is a Strategy game, developed by Japan Art Media (JAM) and published by Media Rings, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Yuu Yuu Jinsei
summary: A board game to simulate life. Similar like monopoly.

name: Yume Smashi
summary: Yume Smashi is a story about Smashotsuki, and how with the power of his nearly limitless imagination he will save the world of his own hellish creation in order to reach UBER Tier. A Yume Nikki parody fangame.

name: Yume Wheeky
summary:
Hey, you know the game Yume Nikki? What if it starred a little animal and didn't feature all that blood and stuff?

You are a guinea pig. Your cage is pretty boss: it's got pellets, hay, water, and a buddy. It's also got a comfy place for naps. You like napping.

Take naps, wander the world of dreams, and be a small animal in a confusing world. Encounter strange landscapes, take on new forms and powers, and discover what probably doesn't actually happen when a little animal goes to sleep!

This is a chill exploration game with 100% original graphics, a pretty boss soundtrack, and some very cute li'l piggies.

name: Yume no Pro Yakyuu
summary: A very early baseball management game. As the coach of the team you manage either the Saitama Seibu Lions or the Yomiuri Giants and make lineup decisions regarding the batting and fielding lineup. Once the game begins you watch a simulated game between the teams. The roster is based on the team roster of 1982.

name: Yuusha
summary:
Yuusha is an erotic RPG.
The characters are based off the popular RPG series called Dragon Quest by Square/Enix.

name: Yume Memochou
summary:
Yume Memochou is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, starring Shiranaishi. The objective of the game is to collect "Charas" (effects) and "Treasures".

Every time Shiranaishi dreams, the type of day cycles through. There are 4 types of "special days". The type of day can be chosen in the options menu using the object in the left side of the bedroom. Depending on what special day it is, important collectible objects may or may not appear.

name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Dark Martial Arts Club
Yume, Shosen Mousou
summary: Yume, Shosen Mousou is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Kamitsuki, who not only refuses to leave their room, but blocks the door. It plays like most fangames, the main objective being to collect all 22 effects to unlock the ending. Also, this game has no background music, although sound effects are fully present.

name: Yummy
summary: "Yummy" is a multiplayer online "hunger" game. In this space where you can eat everything, you can transform into the image of what you eat. This game is cute, sand-sculpted, and exciting. Bring your friends to play!

name: Yum! Finger
summary:
"Yum finger" is a leisure exciting game, players in the game's role is a little fat man is trying to lose weight, you need to finger on the screen, moving through crazy escape cake, ham, green beans, donuts, bananas, etc., which are small monster, once they touch, the fat man will explode! But don't worry, food monsters will be according to their own favorite fixed track running, so as long as your response fast enough, or after a few sessions, just to avoid them well!
Set in the game, there are props, novice players can through use of them to put into this crazy game as soon as possible and then got gold and the great achievement badges. Do not hesitate to begin the fun and exciting trip to burn calories glory!!!!

name: Yunoia
summary: Iris, a light spirit, tends to the color of her world with a prismatic mask. One day, darkness envelops the skies and it begins to vacuum away the colors of her beloved Eden. Set out on a journey together to restore this world by dispersing the iridescence that can be found within.

name: Yuki Nime
summary: A Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. Explore a dreamlike and restless world, discoverer all its secrets...

name: Yumtree
summary:
How savvy are your spending habits? Can you tell a great bargain from a pointlessly pricey purchase?

Well, don’t worry if you can’t spot the difference – we've got the perfect game to get you trained to pick up the best bargains (especially if they’re sausage-based!)

Want to know how to perfect your purchasing powers? All you have to do is:

Buy and sell sausages to get enough money to decorate Gnasher’s kennel!

When you are low on money or sausgages, you will be given the chance to end the biding or selling early

Buy cheap and sell high to make a profit! It's a banger.

So, there you go! Just click Tap To Play and you’ll be richer than Jeff Bezos* in no time!

*Only if you count Jeff Bezos’s fortune in sausages that is, which, let's be honest, he probably does...

name: YuYu Hakusho
summary: The first YuYu Hakusho game for Game Boy.

name: Yuza
summary: Yuza is a gravity game with a story!

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 4: Battle of Great Duelist - Yugi Deck
summary:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 4: Battle of Great Duelist is a Game Boy Color game and the fourth installment in the Duel Monsters series of Yu-Gi-Oh! It features 900 different cards and was released as three seperate versions, each having a unique selection of cards that can be used during the story and traded with the other versions.

This version focuses on Yami Yugi and the god card Winged Dragon of Ra.

name: Yuge
summary:
Mararthon: Yuge is a 30-level scenario, plus 225 secret levels for extra gameplay.
Full of inside jokes, procedurally generated levels, and minimalist textures, Mararthon: Yuge combines serious Marathon 2-style combat with an irreverent setting.

name: Yume 3
summary: YUME 3 is a maze break-through game. Players need to use the keyboard to control two characters to reach the designated position, and then they can enter the next level.

name: Yuuki no Suiri Nori 3: Balance no Ii Shokuji
Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Zuzu v. Julia
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Melodious Deck and Gem-Knight Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Yugo’s Synchro Dimension
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Speedroid Deck and Goyo Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yubu: The Shoeventure
summary: Yubu: The Shoeventure is a 3D platformer where you embark on an extraordinary journey alongside Yubu. In the realm of Yubu, shoes hold the key to unimaginable powers, so why not utilize them to defeat the Reseller?

name: Yusha: Heaven's Gate
summary:
Yusha: Heaven's Gate is a 3D fighting game with an arcade and Vs. mode. The player can choose from one of the eight combatants that are available at the start, with a few more characters being available once their unlocked. Each character has a different nationality, specialty, and lineage. Each character represents either a good or an evil alignment and depending on the character chosen, it affects which final boss the player will have to fight against.

Defending, punching and kicking are on three separate buttons. There are variations of each of these moves depending on how quick the button is pressed.

Consistently damaging or taking damage from an opponent will add to a sol or lunar (depending on the character the player is playing as) power gauge. When this gauge is filled, the player is temporarily invincible and allows the player to use strong power assault moves.

name: Yummy Nuts
summary: Cut the ropes, collect the nuts, have fun!

name: Yuki's Palpitating, Passionate, Phenomenal, and quite frankly Proficient quest for a hot girlfriend!!!
summary: useless lesbian tries to get a girlfriend

name: Yummy
summary: A clone of Gussun Oyoyo with original graphics. The player character is the same girl from Magic Jelly.

name: YuYu Hakusho Dai-Ni-Dan: Ankoku Bujutsu Kai-hen
summary: The second YuYu Hakusho game for Game Boy.

name: Yuonger Adventure
summary: A hardcore platformer for fans of challenging games. Your adventure will begin in an unknown man-made zone full of traps, electricity and magicians. Try to collect as many energy balls as possible and avoid falling into the clutches of enemies!

name: Yume no Oto
summary: Yume no Oto is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The gameplay of Yume no Oto is similar to a text-adventure game; only your commands are limited to choices.

name: Yucatan
summary: Yucatan is a fast-paced, fake-mexican, space-punk driving experience. It's a 3D racing game, with metroidvania elements. You unlock abilities and use them to unlock new areas and new tracks. There's a cast of fun characters, and a cool story (bro). But most of all it has amazing handling, exceptional drifting, some serious jumps, and you can drive upside down.

name: Yume Fumi
summary: Yume Fumi is a Spanish Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Lilit and Insomnia. In Yume Fumi the player follows the traditional exploration concept as Yume Nikki. You always start as Lilit, and you can switch to Insomnia and back using a book. Your main goal is to collect all effects for both characters.

name: Yuusha no Kuse ni Konamaiki da Dash!!
Yuugen Gaisha Brave Company
summary: Yuugen Gaisha Brave Company is a strategy game, released only in Japan.

name: Yume Shikki
summary:
Yume Shikki (sometimes referred to as Yume 4kki) is a fan collaboration project created by users of 4channel/4chan's /v/ board.
The gameplay of Yume Shikki is that of a traditional fangame and involves exploring a variety of different worlds and collecting various effects. No endings or end goal exists in the game. The protagonist of the fangame is Yotsuba Koiwai, the main character of the Yotsuba&! manga.

name: Yume Oukoku to Nemureru 100-nin no Ouji-sama
summary: Yume Oukoku to Nemureru 100-nin no Ouji-sama/100 Sleeping Princes and the Kingdom of Dreams is a Japanese puzzle and role-playing smartphone game published by GCrest. It was released on Android and iOS devices in 2015. An original net animation by Satelight was released in 2017.

name: Yu Hayami no American Kids: Eigo de Tango
YuraYura!: Tidying up the Tilting Tower!
summary: A physics game where brave players must stay alive on a suspended disc!

name: Yumemiru Pyon-pyon Land
summary: Yumemiru Pyon-pyon Land is a music/rhythm game.

name: YumeCore
summary: "YumeCore" is a new generation kawaii belt scroll game in which belt scroll action and search ADV are fused. A sickly girl punches and throws a patient in a lucid dream.

name: Yuuto Ichika Makes Friends
summary:
The bootleg 2hu Yuuto Ichika is back to make some new friends!

This Game Boy homebrew is available to be played on emulators, such as Visual Boy Advance, and real hardware. Explore a town full of thugs and befriend all sorts of criminals and crazy people. Discover what happens after the events of Super Ledgehop: Double Laser before its proper follow-up game get released.

name: Yume Nikki Tetris Minigame
summary: Yume Nikki Tetris Minigame is a Yume Nikki-inspired fan version of Tetris. It plays just like Tetris, but instead of blocks you play with Yume Nikki effect eggs.

name: YuYu Hakusho: Bakutou Ankoku Bujutsu Kai
summary: YuYu Hakusho: Bakutou Ankoku Bujutsu Kai is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Yume Meikyuu: Kigurumi Daibouken
summary: Yume Meikyuu: Kigurumi Daiboken (also known as Dream Maze Kigurumi Adventures) is a wacky and cute dungeon crawler published by Hector. The game tells the story of a boy who dreams of the mysterious kingdom of Enderia every night. There, he constantly lives exciting adventures and this time he is on a quest to save this world from destruction. Our hero must explore perilous towers and rescue all the kidnapped princesses from the kingdom. He is, however, not alone and friends (Harumi and Zakkari) will later help him out in his journey.

name: Yuki
summary: Explore an abandoned school where memories linger longer than the living. Uncover the mystery of your best friend’s disappearance. Dodge bullets.

name: Yume Shoko
summary: Yume Shoko is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Sudou. Along the way to collecting effects, there are also 3 bonus "Omake" effects.

name: Yuusha-Ou GaoGaiGar: Blockaded Numbers
summary: An adventure game containing two original stories presented as TV episodes set within the GaoGaiGar universe.

name: YuYu Hakusho: Tokubetsu-hen
summary: YuYu Hakusho: Tokubetsu-hen is an Action game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Yume 2: Sleepless Night
summary: In times of war people are on edge and it is more difficult to trust people. People will consider how to survive in the corner of the chaotic world, and so does Monghan. Players can experience the difficulties of wartime life from various angles.

name: Yumeiro Cast: Take a Curtain Call
summary:
The franchise started to be distributed in 2015, impressing with its stage/musical actor + fully voiced story + rhythm game concept
Now, and surprising everyone, Sega announced that it is working on porting the full game Yumeiro Cast as a one-time paid app for smartphones.

name: Yuan Ka Card 2: MetaCard2
summary: Hello everyone, this is my second game "Yuan Ka Card 2". Based on the rich card entries of the first generation, it innovatively incorporates the concept of projectiles. Through the strategic combination of cards and projectile targeting, the control of movement is replaced.

name: Yume Nikki Smash Dream
summary: Yume Nikki Smash Dream is a Yume Nikki-inspired fighting game. You have a choice of three characters: Madotsuki, Poniko and Seccom Masada-Sensei.

name: Yume Iro
summary:
Yume Iro is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, inspired by two games at once - Yume Nikki, and a derived, but unrelated work, Witoru. Just like the original Witoru and its few fangames, this work's design is minimalistic and ​also contains various parodies and references to Japanese pop culture.

In this game, the player takes the role of a girl named Otetsuki who cannot leave her room. As with most traditional Yume Nikki fangames, the player's objective is to collect effects and explore the dream worlds.

name: Yu Jammin
summary: Learn how to make music and hate your creation within the span of two minutes.

name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files - Tournament Tactics
summary: Tournament Tactics immerses you in a challenging tournament set in the Yu Yu Hakusho universe. Create a team with up to five characters, and then use your players' unique combos, supermoves, and other attacks to exploit your opponents' weaknesses. Battlefields are based on locations from the Yu Yu Hakusho show, and you can unlock additional areas throughout the game. You can even challenge your friends and trade items using the Game Boy Advance link cable.

name: Yuuto Ichika Gets DMCA'd
summary: Yuuto Ichika Gets DMCA'd is a bootleg fangame of Super Ledgehop: Double Laser and Yuuto Ichika Makes Friends! Play as best bootleg Yuuto Ichika, and defeat bosses solely by dashing!

name: Yuganda Hibi no Saiko Horror: Imi ga Wakaru to Kowai Youkai Toshi Densetsu Mystery
Yugo: The Non-game
summary: Yugo: the non-game is a virtual space where you can drive a car, listen to the radio, and invite people to talk and share the experience with.

name: YuYu Hakusho
summary: YuYu Hakusho is a fighting game based on the YuYu Hakusho anime. The player can choose from 15 characters, each of which has their own special and hyper moves. The animation for the characters was modeled by the animation studio Pierrot who also did the TV animation.

name: Yume Nikki Hazard
summary: Yume Nikki Hazard is an Yume Nikki mod. In it, the game basically follows the rule of the original gameplay - you play as Madotsuki to search for the effects in her dream world, except now she will have guns as her weapons, and some of the NPCs in the dream world are now dangerous enemies. Madotsuki can now receive health damage in the dream world and be forced to wake up if she's defeated. Players earn money and 3 kinds of medals: Gold, Silver and Copper, by killing the enemies in a single map or triggering the events.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6: Expert 2
summary:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6 Expert 2 is a video game for the Game Boy Advance, released in Japan on December 20, 2001. A modified version was later released under the title Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel.

Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6 Expert 2 is set during the Battle City arc. The player duels characters from the anime and manga. The player can participate in a few tournaments and duel single opponents they come across on the map screen. Cards are awarded for various reasons including defeating opponents, winning tournaments and free cards with the Duelist Weekly magazine.

name: Yume Penguin Monogatari
summary: Penta, a cute blue penguin, has a tragic flaw - he really enjoys eating. As a result, his girlfriend Penko left him for another fashionable penguin called Ginji because, she thinks, he has become too chubby for her liking. And yet, she decides to give him a second chance - if he manages to lose all this weight and keep it off, then she will give all her love and attention to him. But the covetous Ginji doesn't share the same sentiments and will do everything in his power to stop the poor flightless seabird before he slims down.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Dawn of a New Era
summary:
YGOPro The Dawn of a New Era (TDOANE) is the best free Yu-Gi-Oh! online game, TDOANE is fully automated and gives players access to all cards. Latest cards from both TCG and OCG are available and new cards are added as soon as they get announced. The ygopro engine was used to develop the game. Players can chose between single, match and tag duels, the multiplayer section offers ranked and unranked duels.

YGOPro TDOANE also offers a single player section that allows players to test their decks against our advanced dueling robot, in addition to the dueling robot you may also duel popular Yu-Gi-Oh! characters such as Yugi, Kaiba and Joey. We also offer a special puzzle mode and skill tests. Currently a campaign mode is in testing and should be available soon.

The game is fully customizable, players can modify all game textures and sounds, including card pictures. TDOANE offers a range of additional features that set it apart from other Yu-Gi-Oh! games, we offer a deck sharing section that allows players to easily share their decks. Duelists are also able to create teams and start team wars.

YGOPro is great for both casual and hardcore duelists, tournaments are hosted weekly and since cards are added before being officially released and printed, it gives duelists an opportunity to test them before anyone else. Our ranked section allows you to duel against the best players from all around the world. New updates are released constantly introducing new and exciting features.

TDOANE was developed by Kaiba Corporation, the same organization currently developing real duel disks. By using our game you help support all our projects including the duel disk project. Windows and Mac are both supported, to install YGOPro simply download it, run the installer and follow the on-screen prompts.

name: Yume Nikki Ver. 1.00
summary:
Yume Nikki ver. 1.00 is an English Yume Nikki mod developed by 369071 2458. This is an expansion mod that adds a number of new areas and events to the game, along with an alternate ending.

The gameplay remains the same as the original. The player enters the dream world by sleeping in the bed. The main objective of the game also remains the same; the player must obtain all of the effects by exploring the dream world to unlock one of two endings.

name: Yukiusa
summary: A game of bouncing snow rabbits!

name: Yuuyami Doori Tankentai
summary: A cult classic horror adventure game for the PSX created by Spike.

name: YuYu Hakusho Final: Makai Saikyou Retsuden
summary: The game is based on the Saga of the Three Kings, though some characters from the Chapter Black Saga and from the movie appear.

name: Yuzi Lims: Hentai
summary: Yuzi Lims: Hentai - is a game in which you need to identify 10 differences between two pictures and click on the difference.

name: Yum Yum Line
summary: Fantastic fun for all ages. Match up the same colors to clear lines and make sure that you don't get stuck. With infinite replayability and the local battle mode, Yum Yum Line gives you the chance to play by yourself or challenge a friend on the same screen.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Duelist Kingdom
summary: Play Chaos and Ritual Decks. Includes duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Yuya vs Crow
summary: Play Majespecter and Kozmo Decks. Includes duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yume wo Mita
summary: Yume wo Mita is a traditional Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Fumitsuki and Koitsuki, whom you can alternate between through a love letter on their desks, exploring their respective dream worlds.

name: Yump
summary: The year is 2017. the war between aesthetics and level design rages on. cities have collapsed, buildings burned. but from the wake of this destruction comes a guiding light: Yump. Yump is a love letter to 2008 romhacks that protonjon or azureblade would've played, and is the hotly anticipated sequel to Jump.

name: Yuurei Station
summary: A Japanese ghost story hand-painted with watercolors

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Duelingbook
summary: Duelingbook is a Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game simulator that works right in your browser.

name: Yugekitai: Saikyoushin Fukkatsu no Maki
summary: The members of the punk rock band "Yugekitai" find out about a plot to resurrect a god of destruction Susanoo. Hilarity ensues.

name: Yum Yum! Dating Show
summary:
A send-up of dating shows and anime tropes, about 20 minutes per playthrough. Multiple choices - ooh! But only 1 true ending!

May contain a rude word or two, and a lot of innuendo. But apart from that it's innocent enough

name: Yume Tsuduri
summary: Yume Tsuduri is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame where you play as and explore Eritsuki's dream world. The goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Yuque
summary: Yuque is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Sleeping in the bed lets you enter Nire's dream world. From there, you can explore various worlds and collect effects called Buffers.

name: Yumemi Melancholy
summary:
This is a horror ADV game in which you are “nursed” by a cute, but strange and dangerous looking girl.

Will you let her “take care” of you, or will you resist and run away…? The outcome is up to you, the player!

name: Yume no Office
summary: Get ready to step into the ultimate dating simulator and experience the thrill of love in Yume No Office. In this captivating visual novel, you take on the role of Kuta Aoyama, a young professional working in a bustling office alongside five captivating female colleagues. As you navigate your way through the daily grind, you'll have the chance to develop intimate relationships with each of the charming ladies.

name: Yurius's house of spooks
summary: While playing at the local park, Vladimir's nephew accidentally flies his remote controlled airplane right into crazy Yurius’s house. Join Vladimir on his journey of retrieving his nephew's toy back.

name: Yuki's Tale
summary: Yuki's Tale is an adult Yaoi JRPG inspired by Japanese anime and tells a story about a young healer named Yuki who has to face a dilemma: to get a great reward by returning to his guild or help his fellow adventurer and then turn into a hero.

name: Yuka: Scattered Shards of the Yokai
summary:
Thanks to Kappa's careless mistake, Yuuka's common sense and sexual reasoning broke out of her mind into fragments and were scattered all around the world... but by strange coincidence, a mortal from the nearby village just happened to be there and as consequence, he was forced to explain what happened...
The pieces could not be seen with the naked eye and yet the mortal could... so he was forced by Yuuka to help collect the pieces in order to regain the fragments of her mental mind but there was one slight problem...
The fragments were very delicate and easy to break, and if they did then Yuuka's common sense and sexual reasoning will be lost meaning her plump body will be for anyones taking...​

name: Yume Nikki Space
summary: Madotsuki has dreamed so hard that she explored every corner of the dream world countless times... until Masada took Mado to a new space... a YUME NIKKI SPACE.

name: Yujian Love
summary:
Yujian Love is a new type of animated love style game developed by NetEase. It is different from the general game of the same type, as the background of Yujian Love appears in modern and Japanese style.

The game uses Chinese ink and color rendering to create beautiful scenes and characters, with up to a million words of lines acting by top voice actors, players will experience a real feeling of life in the game!

name: Yu-Nama: The Puzzle
summary: A match three spin-off from Sony's "What Did I do to Deserve this, My Lord?" franchise.

name: Yuru-i GeGeGe no Kitaro: Yokai Dotabata Daisensou
Yume Tsushin
summary: Yume Tsushin is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Wormiko. You can explore the dream world to collect effects, or leave the room and explore the town instead.

name: Yumeiro Cast
summary: Yumeiro Cast, or more commonly referred to by its shorthand name, YumeCast is a rhythm game about stage play/musical actors.

name: Yukari 108shiki: Heavenly Fantasia
summary: This is an RPG in which you have to raise Yukari, defeat Yukari, and make your own Yukari the strongest.

name: Yuri Sword Saga
summary: This is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game set in a beautifully drawn Japanese world where you can slay enemies and bullets with simple controls. Parry enemy attacks and use a variety of special moves to defeat powerful demons and evil monsters.

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki vol.2
Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki vol.4
Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki vol.1
summary:
YuYuYui is a VN featuring an original story as well as a retelling of the YuYuYu anime and WaSuYu and NoWaYu light novels in VN format.
Originally a mobile gacha game, the story sections were ported on consoles and divided into 8 volumes, with each volume featuring new bonus chapters.

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki vol.3
Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge is the second Yu-Gi-Oh! game for PC also it's the second one of the three Power of Chaos game series. The game adds features 466 cards, including the 155 cards from the previous game, Yugi the Destiny and 311 new cards.

name: Yume wa Maeyono
summary: Yume wa Maeyono is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play a boy named Yoruzuki who stays in his room and refuses to go out.. The goal in the dream world is to explore and collect effects. Interacting with the music pod allows you to listen to music from the game.

name: Yume Nikki: Dream Dairy
summary: Madotsuki has left her room and gotten a job at a milkshake cafe. A point-and-click game where you must help her make drinks for the customers.

name: Yummy Jewels
summary: Go on a candy puzzle adventure.

name: Yu Hayami no American Kids: Eigo de Talk
Yuma Nest
summary: Destroy massive swarms of monsters and build automated systems that fight for you in Yuma Nest. An open-world sandbox action RPG where you grow stronger in the overworld before exploring an interconnected underworld.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh PokéDuel
summary: This game is a mod for Pokemon Fire Red which replaces all the pokemon with iconic Yu-Gi-Oh monsters and includes pokemon mechanics up to gen 9.

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki - Vol. 8
Yu Sha Rong Shen Jin
summary: What kind of product is it? It is a simple tower defense game with text plot, visual interaction of novels, and the nature of love cultivation.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Transer
summary: There is a mystery inside this Yu-Gi-Oh! battle, and the only way to solve it is to win! Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Master of the Card sends you into the world of the Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's animated series to do battle against the Duelist Corps on the island of Ragnarok. Who are the members of the Duelist Corps and what are they after? You'll find out in a completely original storyline centered around the Wii-exclusive Duel of Legend Cup. Play against 20 Yu-Gi-Oh! characters, including some that have never appeared in a video game. In single-player or online two-player, you'll battle with over 4,500 Yu-Gi-Oh! cards.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Waking the Dragons - Yugi’s Journey
summary: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Fang of Critias Deck and Aromage Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Double Pack
summary: The first two-game cartridge for the Game Boy Advance Yu-Gi-Oh! games, released by Konami in 2006, this time focusing on Reshef of Destruction, and The Sacred Cards.

name: YuYu Hakusho II: Gekitou! Nanakyou no Tatakai
summary: YuYu Hakusho II: Gekitou! Nanakyou no Tatakai is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the YuYu Hakusho manga and anime series.

name: YumeSD
summary: YumeSD is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Tsukiai's dreams and find effects.

name: Yume Henrī
summary: A simple Yume Nikki fan game. Explore the dream world and collect all of the effects to win.

name: Yume Mienai: Pocket Version
summary:
Yume Mienai is a GameBoy-style Yume Nikki Fangame made by Annie-Mienai in RPG Maker VX Ace in 2019. The first version was made for Dream Diary Jam 3.

Like Yume Nikki, you can sleep, explore, and get effects, but with the difference that there are RPG-style battles and dialogues.

name: Yusetsu
summary: Snow melting bar, melt the ice in your heart. This is a warm love game, where you can enjoy a real Japanese bar love experience.

name: Yume Mitai
summary: Yume Mitai is a traditional Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The objective is to explore Tsukino's dream world and obtain effects to unlock the ending.

name: Yume no Radio
summary: Yume no Radio is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Kakutsuki and explore her dream world. The goal is to explore and collect effects (which are some objects that glow lights). A minigame called Shiwake is accessible by interacting with the device next to the notebook.

name: Yume Nikki Ware
summary: WarioWare, but it's Yume Nikki!

name: Yume Kart
summary: A cancelled Yume Nikki kart racer fan game. A few early versions were released, but were taken offline.

name: Yume Kayoi
summary: Yume Kayoi is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You can play as two girls named Kotozuki and Satotsuki, who stay in different apartments and can't leave their rooms.

name: Yupitergrad: Sneaki Peaki
summary: Sneaki Peaki is a special, free edition of Yupitergrad - a Virtual Reality game with spatial acrobatics, wacky humor and lots of sovietpunk adventures!

name: Yuzai x Muzai
summary: A laywer adventure game.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories
summary:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories, released in Japan as Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters III: Tri-Holy God Advent, is a Game Boy Color video game and the third title in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters series of games. It was released in Japan on July 13, 2000, and it was the first Yu-Gi-Oh! video game to be released outside of Japan, with a United States release date of March 19, 2002.

Players of the game can trade and battle with other players using a link cable.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters II: Dark Duel Stories
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters II: Dark Duel Stories is a video game for the Game Boy Color, the sequel to Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters. Although the gameplay is still much simpler than the OCG, this game introduced 355 new cards, for a total of 720 (in contrast with the 365 total cards of its predecessor). Trap Cards and Ritual Spell Cards were first included in this game.

name: Yume Tagai
summary:
Yume Tagai is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game's first act is centered around Makitsuki, a girl living in a small abandoned room who cannot leave.
Upon accomplishing a series of tasks, Sakiyuk becomes a playable character. From this point onwards, you can alternate between her and Makitsuki by waking up, with the dream world's bedroom being the main area.

name: YuMayhem
summary: YuMayhem (夢異変) is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Yume Gatari
summary: Yume Gatari is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Netsuki, a boy that refuses to leave his room. Once in the dream world, the player can explore and collect effects. A mini game called SOUL can also by played by interacting with the console.

name: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 1 - Renaissance, Baroque no Kyoshou
summary: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 1: Renaissance, Baroque no Kyoshou is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Interchannel, which was released in Japan in 2007. Players complete jigsaw puzzles of various sizes and challenge levels to reveal stunning works of classical artwork.

name: Yuoni
summary: Yuoni is a first-person narrative horror game that whisks you away to a sunset-stained world to play a deadly game of hide and seek. As grade-schooler Ai, navigate authentic Japanese environments and utilise every hiding space you can find to survive the horrors ahead. And if they find you… run.
